aboutme.txt:
I'm Jayson Acosta, a Computer Engineering student graduating in May 2026.
I'm passionate about creating solutions to everyday problems and exploring
emerging technologies.

My journey in tech began with curiosity about video game mechanics, which
evolved into fascination with consumer electronics.
After getting my first laptop, I taught myself programming and have been
building my skills ever since.

Technical interests: Web Development, Embedded Systens, Android Development

When I'm not coding or building circuits, you can find me researching new
technologies, exploring the outdoors, or gaming.

I'm constantly learning and would love to connect with others who share similar
interests!
